title: Untitled
contents:
I have two cats lying on me as I write this.
One is named Lana, and she is calm and chill.
One is named Murphy, and he is a tornado.
To have both cats sleeping and keeping my legs warm is the motivation I needed to keep pushing to understand this tonight.
I also got motivation by having fun writing code that visualizes a cow quoting random Wikipedia facts.


 ----- 
Here's some news from 02 September 2015. The ancient temples of Bel (pictured in 2010) and Baalshamin in Palmyra are destroyed by the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant. (Courtesy of Wikipedia)
